basnahira palathe siyaluma paudgalika bas mema 11 wanida dawasa pura warjanayaka yedawimata samastha lanka paudgalika bas samagam sammelanaya ha lanka paudgalika bas himiyange sangamaya eekabaddha thiranayak gena thibe.basnahira palathe dhawanaya karana bas rathawalata amatharawa thawath 20%k bas ratha yedawimata wirodhaya pala kirima ha awama bas gasthuwa wana rupiyal 6 rupiyal 7 dakwa wadikara ganima aramunu kotagena sangam dekama ekwa mema warjana kriyamargaya ganna bawa ema sangamwala sabhapathiwarun wana stanli pranandu ha gamunu wijerathna yana mahathwaru pawasuha.sabhapathiwarun mema adahas pala kale narahenpita kantha paryeshana puhunu kendraye eeye (4) pawathi madhya sakachchawediya.mema thiranaya pilibanda janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathata prawahana amathithumata ha magi prawahana adhikariyata danum dena bawath sathiyak athulatha wisandumak nolabunahoth sthira washayenma basnahira palathe 8500 k pamana wana siyaluma paudgalika bas ratha 11 wanida dhawanaya nokarana bawath sabhapathiwaru pawasuha.warjanayen pasuwada wisandumak nolabunahoth mulu rata purama paudgalika bas akhanda warjanayak karana bawa da stanli pranandu ha gamunu wijerathna yana mahathwaru pawasuha.

wawuniyawa bandhanagaraya watala polis wishesha karya balakaya wisin pasugiya dineka sidukala paharadimehi prathipalayak lesa nimalaruban namathi demala jathika sirakaru miya gos thibe.wadi sambhawithawayak thibenne meya bahutharayak janaya thula kisidu kampanayak athi nokarana samanya puwathak pamanak wimataya.siya sagayan kihipa deneku aparadha wimarshana anshayata ragena yamata erehiwa wawuniyawa sirakaruwan wisin ehi jelarwarun kipa deneku radawa ganimin wirodhathawayak diyath kala athara pasuwa hamudawa madihathwa eya mardhanaya karanu labiya.wishesha karya balakaye mema meheyuma dinapatha diwayina puwathpatha wisin wartha kara thibune "wawuniyawa bandhanagaraye koti sellam madalayi" yana hisini.wimal wirawansha amathiwarayata sambandha web adawiyak eya wartha karannata yodagaththe " prana apakaruwan mudagena koti chandith kudalagena eyi" yana shirshayayi.
walangu nowana giwisumak padanam kara ganimin indiyanu thel samagama wasara 13kata adhika kalayak athi wishala labhayak upaya athi bawada ohu kiya.
